But a couple things here are true.

-You were let go and are upset.

-Insults mean you lost the debate/argument.

-The only one FOR SURE without a bright future is YOU.

Examine what you bring to the table. It obviously isn't much.

Some people suspect that some HQ office employees are working 2 jobs and have been for a while. When stuff isn't getting done, or there is sudden aggressiveness with claiming this or that isn’t part of their job, or people take off random mid-week days off on short notice or same-day notice because they have to go into the office for their other job, it’s all some of the many signs that it could be occurring. Some are genuinely busy and short staffed after cuts last year and this past March, but some are probably working 2 jobs.
